name: Halloween Pumpkins heroes fighters, trick or treat
name_original: Halloween Pumpkins heroes fighters, trick or treat
description:
Welcome to a new adventure "Halloween Pumpkins heroes fighters". Trick dark silhouettes, it means kick out dark characters, with your naughty pumpkins fighters,

Earn more and more sweet and juicy candies

Use your candies to get and update new powerful fighters pumpkins in your army

Reach the checkpoint on time to get extra candies and go to the next adventure !

Trick or Treat : share candies with Leo and Lea and discover their beautiful costumes !

Features :
100 Candies credit to start to trick your foes. Then you need to play hard to earn more delicious candies !
Guess famous silhouettes characters in game play. You may recognize them. Good Luck !
Share awesome candies score, with friends on your fan page.
Cross checkpoints and finish line to feel happy and proud when you succeed your missions.
Having fun to play this new generation of toy blast category game it's ones of the a nicest and funniest halloween games !
Enjoy this free halloween game.
Happy Halloween with one of the cutest games for kids, games for girls and actually for everyone !
